ETYMOLOGY: From Old French 'braguette' (codpiece), diminutive of 'brague' (breeches). The sense developed from a projecting support resembling a codpiece to other meanings like punctuation marks and categories.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A projecting support for a shelf, lamp, or other structure, typically made of metal, wood, or stone.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种突出物，用于支撑搁板、灯具或其他结构，通常由金属、木材或石头制成。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He fixed the shelf to the wall with a sturdy wooden bracket.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他用一个坚固的木支架把架子固定在墙上。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Either of a pair of marks used to enclose words or figures so as to separate them from the context, especially parentheses ( ), square brackets [ ], or curly brackets { }.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 用于将词语或数字与上下文分开的一对符号中的任何一个，特指圆括号 ( )、方括号 [ ] 或花括号 { }。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please put the optional information in square brackets.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请将可选信息放在方括号内。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A category or range of people or things, typically defined by age, income, or other characteristics.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一群人或事物的类别或范围，通常由年龄、收入或其他特征定义。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The new tax changes will affect people in the higher income bracket.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 新的税收变化将影响高收入阶层的人。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A transitive verb, meaning it takes a direct object.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To enclose (words or figures) in brackets.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 用括号将（词语或数字）括起来。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: You should bracket any explanations you add to a quotation.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 你应该将你添加到引文中的任何解释用括号括起来。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A transitive verb, meaning it takes a direct object.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To group or classify (people or things) together.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 将（人或事物）归类或分在一起。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It's unfair to bracket all young people together as lazy.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 把所有年轻人一概归为懒惰是不公平的。

REGISTER: General usage, common in everyday language, academic, and technical contexts.
